long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily Reopen Closed Tabs with a Simple Popup

How to Use:

- Click the toolbar button to open a popup displaying your recently closed tabs.
- Select the tab you want to restore by clicking on it.
- To remove a specific entry, simply click the red delete button on the right side of the tab.
